title: Friend’s death ‘led to Odom binge’
text:
Email a friend 
LAMAR Odom had a “death wish” brought about in part by the heroin-related death of his best friend, the friend’s dad said, as the former NBA star fights for his life in hospital following a mammoth three-day sex and drugs binge. 
The revelation comes amid mixed reports Odom is showing signs of improvement. Entertainment Tonight reports Odom opened his eyes and was able to communicate. When asked to see his children, he communicated “Yes”, but it’s unclear if he spoke or used body language, ET reports citing an unnamed source. 
But TMZ reports that while there have been some body movements, including eye opening, doctors have made it clear the movements are all involuntary. The website however quotes sources familiar with the situation as saying tests carried out on Friday showed Odom’s heart function is “much better”. Doctors told his family and friends this is a good sign of improvement, that a critical organ is responding, the website reports. So sad ... Kris Jenner, Kylie Jenner and Kourtney Kardashian leave the Sunrise Hospital after visiting Lamar Odom. Picture: David Becker Source: AFP 
Odom, 35, reportedly spent $US75,000 ($103,000) upfront on two prostitutes during the binge that led to him being found unconscious and foaming at the mouth at the infamous Love Ranch brothel in Nevada. He is currently in a coma at the Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas. 
“I think Lamar is done. I think most of it is because he missed my son so much,” Guillermo Castillo told The New York Daily News. 
Mr Castillo’s son Jamie Sangouthai - a best man at Odom and Khloe Kardashian’s 2009 wedding - died in June from a flesh-eating bacteria linked to intravenous heroin abuse. 
Speaking of Odom’s close friendship with his son, who also appeared on the couple’s E! reality show Khloe & Lamar, the grieving dad said: “I think deep inside they had a death wish, or a wish to die together. It sounds very cold-blooded, but I have a hard time controlling my emotions.” Family friend ... Jamie Sangouthai with Khloe Kardashian. Picture: Facebook Source: Supplied Death wish? ... Lamar Odom and Jamie Sangouthai pictured together. Picture: Facebook Source: Supplied 
There are conflicting reports about the NBA star’s condition with Radar Online reporting a hospital source saying the overdose had left him with “no brain activity”. 
The brothel’s owner, Dennis Hof, said Odom, the estranged husband of Khloe Kardashian, had planned on more than a week of around-the-clock debauchery, the New York Post reports . 
“You can spend as little or as much as you want,” Mr Hof told daytime TV host ​Wendy Williams. Brothel ... the room where former NBA player Lamar Odom was found unconscious at the Love Ranch Las Vegas. Picture: Steven Lawton Source: Getty Images 
“It happened that Lamar wanted a long period of time,” Mr Hof said. “He gave the girls $75,000, but he planned on being there a long time — at least five days.” 
Mr Hof has been criticised by the Kardashian family for seeking the spotlight as Odom fights for his life. But the family’s call for him to stop doing media interviews have fallen on deaf ears with Mr Hof saying he told a Kardashian publicist “to go to hell”. 
A man who claimed he was Odom’s former drug dealer in New York told Radar Online that Odom smoked more than $US50,000 worth of cocaine from 2010 to 2013, even binging before NBA games. Glittering career ... Lamar Odom during his time at the LA Lakers. Source: AP 
“In my experience, he literally likes cocaine — he is a cocaine guy. He likes to smoke it,” the man said. 
As Khloe Kardashian continued her bedside vigil, reports emerged that he had squeezed the hand of his sister-in-law Kim Kardashian. Family in pain ... Kris Jenner and Kim Kardashian leave the Sunrise Hospital. Picture: Steven Lawton Source: Getty Images 
But doctors told TMZ that a hand squeeze could be just an involuntary response and — as his organs were so badly damaged — it was not necessarily a sign of recovery. 
The rest of the Kardashian clan — Kris Jenner, Kim Kardashian, Kourtney Kardashian and Kylie Jenner — have flown back to Los Angeles on a private jet. 
Youngest sister Kylie posted an emotional throwback photo on Instagram, captioned “Let’s dance together soon”. 
Kendall Jenner is reportedly flying from London to visit the former LA Laker. please don't go. — Kendall Jenner (@KendallJenner) October 14, 2015 Praying for Lamar Praying nonstop for my Brother Beautiful soul 
Odom has reportedly long struggled with cocaine addiction. 
When he arrived at the Love Ranch brothel, owner Dennis Hoff claimed he warned the former NBA champ that drugs were not allowed on the premises, the New York Post says. 
“Came out, great guy, great mood, having a lot of fun,” Hof said. “Partying with the girls, drinking his cognac — we didn’t see any signs of drugs at all.” Devastated ... Lamar Odom's son Lamar Odom Jr and ex-partner Liza Morales, on right, visit him in hospital. Source: Getty Images 
Hof claimed the two-time NBA Championship winner told him that he had been “partying in Vegas and doing some coke” but had not brought any to the brothel. 
“And I want to take him at his word, although we all know that drug addicts lie,” Hof said. “And I just hope that he was honest and that wasn’t the cause of it.”
